column5: Ca. 1914 Craftsman Bungalow located 2 blocks from the seawall offers a peaceful setting surrounded by lush tropical gardens. Lovingly restored this gem include a well equipped gourmet kitchen, updated period style baths, and comfortable eclectic furnishings. Enjoy the sounds and breezes of the gulf on the 30' long front porch.
column8: Circa 1914 Craftsman Bungalow - walk to the beach!
